page.title: 06EDUCATION, EMPLOYMENT
page.content: additional temporary classroom. The school is planned to be sited beside the 11-16 School and Community College with its 35 teachers and 566 students. Barnstaple College of Further Education cater for the 16+ students. {EMPLOYMENT }The nearest Employment Office is Barnstaple. Generally all but 3 or 4% carry on with Further Education or gain employment. Except for nationalised bodies most people are not paid the 'union rates' but what the employer and employee agree upon - the 'going rate'. Many of the working population have one or more part-time jobs. Apart from the{service industries of the market place which caters for most needs and the{primary industry of farming, the{manufacturing industries, all in the village are mainly: the agricultural engineers for
